npmjs.com

npm.community

We invite our community to participate in the growth &
development of npm in the following channels

Bug Tracker

Search or submit bugs against the npm CLI or any of our other maintained OSS projects

Documentation

The official API docs & how-tos for all things npm
 

Events

Keep track of our Open RFC calls, releases, meetups, conferences & more!

Roadmap

Track & follow along with our public roadmap
 

Feedback

Contribute ideas & discussion around the npm registry, website & CLI

RFCs

Contribute ideas & specifications for the API/design of the npm CLI

Archived Forum

>Reference to the archived community forums
 

Service Status

Monitor the current status & see incident reports for the website & registry

Project Status

See the health of all our maintained OSS projects in one view

Support

Experiencing problems with the website or registry? File a ticket here
